meanings.definition: To state or show the meaning of (a word or phrase)
meanings.sent2: She will define the word 'courage' for the class.
meanings.sent3: The dictionary tried to define 'unicorn' as a magical horse.
meanings.sent4: His smile defined his joy in a single moment.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used pictures to define the word 'tree' for the students.

meanings.definition: To describe the nature or basic qualities of (something)
meanings.sent1: Please define the characteristics of a good friend.
meanings.sent2: The scientist will define the properties of the new material.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to define the taste of the mysterious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness defined her as a person of great empathy.
meanings.sent5: The artist used colors to define the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.definition: To mark out the boundary or limits of (something)
meanings.sent1: They need to define the area where the garden will be.
meanings.sent2: The surveyor will define the property lines accurately.
meanings.sent3: The children tried to define the boundaries of their game.
meanings.sent4: The river defined the edge of the ancient kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The fence helped define the border between the two fields.
